thread.title: Minnie’s Holiday Dine Coming to Hollywood & Vine
thread.title_full: Minnie’s Holiday Dine Coming to Hollywood & Vine

author: Off to Neverland Travel
title: Minnie’s Holiday Dine Coming to Hollywood & Vine
text:
Request a Quote Minnie’s Holiday Dine Coming to Hollywood & Vine 
As kids across the country start going back to school, the holidays will be here before we know it! 
Today, the Walt Disney World® Resort introduced a new Character Dining experience that will be available for the holidays at Disney’s Hollywood Studios® . Minnie’s Holiday Dine at Hollywood & Vine will be cookin’ up a festive dinner most night Nov. 7, 2015 – Jan. 3, 2016. In addition to your hostess, Minnie, guests can expect to meet Mickey, Donald, Daisy, and Santa Goofy. 
Reservations at Minnie’s Holiday Dine at Hollywood & Vine are available both with and without reserved seating at that night’s showing of Fantasmic! The cost for the Fantasmic! Dining Package is $52.99/adult and $31.99/child (ages 3-9), plus tax and gratuity. Without the reserved seating for Fantasmic, pricing is $46.99/adult and $27.99/child (ages 3-9), plus tax and gratuity or (1) table-service entitlement on your Disney Dining Plan. 
Disney Junor Play ‘n Dine will continue during breakfast and lunch at Hollywood & Vine without changes. Availability is limited, so contact your Magic Maker® today for details or reservations!
